scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.cov: npm run cov:node && npm run cov:browser && nyc report
scripts.cov:browser: nyc -s --no-clean --instrument false mochify --transform [ babelify --ignore [ test ] --plugins [ babel-plugin-istanbul ] ] test.js
scripts.coveralls: npm run cov && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > lcov.info
